"Eliminate Agnis II":
"Attention all ARKS ops! You are hereby requested
to fight off as many of the specified hostile as you like!

You will receive your reward when you report back.
The more you fight off, the bigger your reward!

*Normal areas or thereafter recommended.
Agnis of Lv. 1 or higher"

"アークス各員へオーダーを通達します！
指定したエネミーを可能な限り
撃退してきてください！

報酬は報告時にお渡しします！
撃退数が多ければ多いほど
報酬も増えますからね！

※ノーマルエリア推奨
Lv.1以上のアギニスが対象"
